ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Melody of Ervaj
ygData.msgSnippet: its worth about the same as hmm lets say a raw hide bracer 8) only use it to raise brass skill cause of all the pretty little colors. I ve gotten a few tells
ygData.messageBody:
its worth about the same as hmm lets say a raw hide bracer 8)

only use it to raise brass skill cause of all the pretty little colors.

I've gotten a few tells from people trying to sell it to me for 1k or 2, but
guildies gave it to me, sorry not sure where they got it

-----Original Message-----
From: beatdropbattledrum@...
[mailto:beatdropbattledrum@...]
Sent: March 15, 2001 7:19 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Melody of Ervaj


I took a break from EQ just before SoV came out and I just recently
started playing a lot again. Well, during the break I was a little
out of the loop so I have a couple of questions regarding this song.
First off, I know that this is a mob dropped spell in Velious. What
zones/mobs is it most commonly found on? And... What are people
paying/charging for this song?

Please help, thanks ;)
